titles.title: We See The Lord, And He Is High Upon His Throne

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We see the Lord, and He is high upon the throne,
And His glory fills the heavens and the earth.
One like a lamb Who was slain is on the throne,
So I cast my crown before You and bow down to praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For everything cries holy,
Oh everything cries holy,
Oh everything cries holy to You, Lord.
For everything cries holy,
Oh everything cries holy,
Oh everything cries holy to You, Lord.
